description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: An issue in Advanced Plugins ultimateimagetool module for PrestaShop before v.2.2.01, allows a remote attacker to escalate privileges and obtain sensitive information via Improper Access Control.

Un problema en el módulo de complementos avanzados ultimateimagetool para PrestaShop anterior a v.2.2.01 permite a un atacante remoto escalar privilegios y obtener información confidencial a través de un control de acceso inadecuado.
